mapper.update: update tp_fans_sale set industry = #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, verify = #{verify,jdbcType=BIT}, user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, industry, createtime, account, mobile, wechat, verify, user_id from tp_fans_sale
